typeInternalName.description: The internal name of the page type. Must be unique within the space.

pageName.description: The name of the page. Must be unique within the space.

name.description: The name of the attribute. Must be unique within the page.

dateValue.description: The value of the attribute if the attribute is a date attribute. Must be a valid date string in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

dateValues.description: The values of the attribute if the attribute is a date attribute. Must be an array of valid date strings in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

stringValue.description: The value of the attribute if the attribute is a string attribute.

stringValues.description: The values of the attribute if the attribute is a string attribute.

richStringValue.description: The value of the attribute if the attribute is a rich string attribute. Contains HTML.

richStringValues.description: The values of the attribute if the attribute is a rich string attribute. Contains HTML.

booleanValue.description: The value of the attribute if the attribute is a boolean attribute.

numberValue.description: The value of the attribute if the attribute is a number attribute.

numberValues.description: The values of the attribute if the attribute is a number attribute.
